thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Andrea Dedikova

author: Andrea Dedikova
title: Andrea Dedikova
text: I am really satisfied with the customer service. The experience was well beyond my expectations. The company provided excellent service from the product quotation through ordering and to the follow-up process. The product arrived on time in perfect condition and I really got what I ordered.I would highly recommend this company to my friends and colleagues. Thank you Flashbay.
